synthesis.yield: crystals isolated before complete solvent matrix evaporation

crystallography.equipment: APEX II CCD detector of a Bruker-AXS Kappa Duo diffractometer
crystallography.method: direct methods of phase retrieval and full-matrix least squares on F2
crystallography.hydrogen_atoms: positions calculated and constrained or located from difference Fourier map
crystallography.disorder: NH2 group disordered over two sites sets

optical_measurements.equipment: HORIBA Jobin Yvon Fluorolog FL3-221 spectrofluorimeter
optical_measurements.integrating_sphere: 152 mm (6”) integrating-sphere (Quanta-φ equipment, F3029, HORIBA Jobin Yvon)
optical_measurements.spectra_correction: for the spectral response of the integrating-sphere, monochromators, and detector

models.description: one Cd atom and its surrounding ligands
models.details: two acetate, two ampyz and one water
see Figure S1 for such larger model

TD-DFT_calculations.geometry_optimization: DFT with def2-SVP and def2-TZVP basis sets and B3LYP, cam-B3LYP, M06-2X functionals
TD-DFT_calculations.TD-DFT_method: 70 single excited states, spectra from convolution with a 20 nm Gaussian window
TD-DFT_calculations.spectra_adjustments: shifted by 100 nm and intensity rescaled
